fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|600|||||||” text_font_size=”17px” text_orientation=”justified” global_colors_info=”{}”]

As our mission is to reach as many Indian farmers as we can, we know that our tractor dealers are our greatest strength. Without the support of our dealers, it would be impossible for us to reach the corners of the country that heavily relies on agricultural practices. This is why we believe in the philosophy of considering our dealers as partners in our business.

We offer a guaranteed return on your investments and end-to-end support to the people who choose to be a part of our tractor dealership. Whether is it tractors for farming that you are interested in, or Pick-n-carry cranes, Indo Farm is the best option. 

  • At Indo Farm, we redefine partnerships by embracing the philosophy that our dealers are more than just associates; they are valued business partners.  
  • Indo Farm treats our tractor dealers as integral Business Partners, emphasizing a collaborative approach for mutual success. 
  • A dedicated Research, Design, Development, and Testing Department employs cutting-edge technology to create tractors tailored to evolving farming needs.  
  • The company boasts a new plant and modern casting unit equipped with the latest machinery, ensuring high-quality production. 
  • Utilization of advanced ERP systems like SAP ensures professional and streamlined management processes. 
  • A youthful, energetic, and responsive management team, with an average age of 35, fosters innovation and adaptability. 
  • Indo Farm cultivates an open-minded culture and operates on an open-door policy, promoting transparency and collaboration. 
  • Demonstrates a commitment to speed with faster turn-around time in product development and swift decision-making processes. 
  • Adheres to a policy of sourcing parts exclusively from top Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs), ensuring product excellence. 
  • Indo Farm demonstrates a clear vision, willingness, and determination for sustained growth in the industry. 
  • Leadership at the highest levels comprises seasoned professionals with rich industry experience, providing strategic direction and expertise. 

Partner with Indo Farm and unlock Variety!

  • We offer a power spectrum from 20 HP tractor  to 110 HP tractor, our 3 and 4-cylinder tractors are designed for optimal performance. 
  • Our pick ‘n’ carry hydraulic mobile cranes cover a weight range of 9 to 25 Tonnes, providing reliable lifting solutions. 
  • Experience enhanced capabilities with our next-generation pick ‘n’ carry hydraulic mobile cranes, ranging from 15 to 30 Tonnes. 
  • Featuring track-driven Axial Flow and Straw-Walker technologies, our harvester combines are built for efficiency in agricultural operations. 
  • Catering to diverse agricultural needs, our Rotary Tillers come in sizes ranging from 5 feet to 8 feet, ensuring versatility and productivity. 

Indo Farm takes pride in offering tractors that stand out for their exceptional value for money. Our tractors embody a perfect blend of cost-effectiveness and proficiency, incorporating cutting-edge global technology. Known for their might and reliability, Indo Farm tractors are not only efficient and economical but also boast a “POWE
R+MILEAGE” tractor range, emphasizing both strength and fuel efficiency that help you build trust and grow your business. 

Become an Indo Farm tractor dealer today!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_video src=”https://youtube.com/shorts/r0xeHOGZgC8?feature=share” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#efefef” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#efefef” custom_padding=”||||false|true” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We believe and value our Partnerships

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text module_id=”contactForm” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

"*" indicates required fields

Name*

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Benefits of Partnering with Indo Farm 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]Widespread Product Portfolio

As a partner of Indo Farm, you gain access to our comprehensive range of high-quality agricultural and construction equipment. From tractors and harvesters to cranes, we offer a varied lineup of machinery that supplies the evolving needs of the market. 
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]Trusted Brand

Indo Farm is a trusted name in the industry, renowned for its commitment to quality, reliability, and innovation. By associating your business with our esteemed brand, you benefit from the trust and confidence that our customer base has in Indo Farm. Strengthen your market presence with a tractor brand that is identical to excellence. 
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]Technical Assistance

We understand the importance of providing prompt and reliable technical support to ensure easy operations and customer satisfaction. Our dedicated technical team can always assist you with installation, maintenance, and troubleshooting. Count on Indo Farm to be your trusted partner in delivering exceptional after-sales service. 
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]Marketing & Sales Support

We believe in empowering our partners with the tools and resources they need to succeed. As an Indo Farm partner, you receive comprehensive marketing and sales support, including promotional materials, training programs, and strategic guidance. Leverage our expertise and maximize your reach to capture new customers and increase your market share. 
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]Better Growth Opportunities

Partnering with Indo Farm opens a world of growth opportunities for your business. Benefit from our extensive dealer network, nationwide presence, and growing customer base. Double your income and resources with the backing of a solid and reputable brand. 
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]Join the Indo Farm family and board them on a growth and success journey. Together, let’s shape the future of agriculture and construction. Contact us today to explore partnership opportunities and take the first step towards a rewarding collaboration with Indo Farm. 
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
